nodes.text: Garello Technologies was a midlevel materials research and manufacturing concern based out of the Keftia district on the planet Ab Dalis during the High Republic Era, led by Larence Garello. When Ab Dalis was struck by the first Emergence of the Great Hyperspace Disaster, Garello ordered his entire workforce to evacuate the planet with their families aboard a convoy of six freighters. As the convoy left Ab Dalis, it was attacked by members of the Nihil.
